topics.title: JSON as Deep Linker?
topics.body: wondering if i can forward a domain directly to a post in "Talk"

1595@69.body:
http://spectrum.ieee.org/computing/networks/the-future-of-the-web-looks-a-lot-like-bitcoin
Ethereum is one of the reasons behind my username.

18@2.body:
you handled that attempted FUD very well. It is absurd to want a file uploader app to put files on your own computer. Heh.

 I really dig everything you have been doing. It would be super if you could implement punycode to the address url. emojiday.bit has errors posted in the blog, if that helps. Thanks again for all your great work :D
